decisions.decision: Establish SKILL-STANDARDS-RECONCILED.md as single source of truth
decisions.rationale: Fragmented knowledge across memories and documents causes confusion
decisions.impact: All skill development references one authoritative document

decisions.rationale: ai-agents extends official standard with compatible enhancements
decisions.impact: Skills remain portable while supporting project-specific optimizations

decisions.decision: Obsolete 5 fragmented memories with superseded_by links
decisions.impact: Old memories point to new authoritative memory (ID 175)

patterns.context: Multiple conflicting sources create decision paralysis
patterns.application: Create single reconciled reference when knowledge fragments
Document which requirements are official vs project-specific

patterns.context: Old memories need graceful deprecation with forward links
patterns.application: Mark obsolete with reason and pointer to replacement

avoidances.antipattern: Creating documentation without checking existing Pester tests
avoidances.consequence: Duplicate test files in wrong location
avoidances.correction: Always verify test location via git history first

avoidances.consequence: ADR-017 validation failure at commit time
